page.title: 05The Health Centre
page.content: The Health Centre has many services which are open to the public, ranging from feet to teeth. The chemist is situated inside the centre and has its own full-time pharmacist. This is very convient. From Monday to Saturday the Health Centre is open at various times. There are 5 permanent doctors and 5 doctors who have different days to work over the week. Each doctor has his/her own health visitor who not only looks after children, but mothers as well, throughout pregnancy until the child is 2 years old. They will see the family at home as well as on special days at the centre for weighing, vaccinating, etc. The school medical services are also based at the centre. These include Dr. Daniels, school nurses, speech therapist and a dentist.
